name: Magdalena Herrera de Leon
text: Yummy pizza, pasta and salads. Great prices for combos!

name: Gavin Rieser
text: Pizza tasted pretty good. Maybe not the best best but definitely solid. Staff were friendly and helpful. …More

name: koichi sakakibara
text: Love love love the all veggie pizza they even let me sub Roma tomatoes since I didn't eat olives! Wish we had you in Raleigh!! While I'm in Portland I'll definitely be back!!!

name: rickcanna buler-stairs
text: Fast service, delicious pizza!

name: Casey Campbell
text: Love this place for a lunch spot between my Saturday shifts. The people working there are friendly, it's laid back, and they are always rocking some good tunes.

name: Greg Stone
text: Great place to eat.  The lunch combo is economical and tasty.

name: Roy Wilmoth
text: Best around cold beer great pizza and the staff have such beautiful smiles both ladys were great

name: Kyle Humphrey
text: This place had really good pizza and the prices weren't too bad. It just took them awhile to get our pizza despite the restaurant not being very busy.

name: Doug Alvarez
text: Pizza Schmizza is always good! The staff at this location is really nice too. And they have that amazing taco truck pizza!

name: Erik Holte
text: I need to make a retraction for a comment I left last night about this place. It was about a what was being played on the speakers, which is usually amazing music.  There was a tech problem and radio was played.  Since I came in that day in …More

name: Mike Mitchell
text: Good pie good value, staff was great.

name: Kurtis
text: Can't go wrong with Pizza Schmizza. The pizza is amazing! really amazing! I can eat it everyday if I had to. With the perfect value for a slice or two you can't go wrong. The service at this location is great! and I location is perfect for downtown. Keep up the great work you guys!

name: PaulsGamingHub
text: Pretty good pizza place very yummy pizza but pretty pricey too.

name: John M. Scullin
text: Courteous, fast delivery and delicious New York Style pizza! Not sure about the negative reviews, maybe they caught them on a bad day, but we enjoyed it. We called for delivery to a downtown hotel, it was delivered hot and fresh, very quickly.  Thanks!

name: Megan Hall
text: Overpriced and tables were dirty. Maybe it is an experience some people go for, but I didn't find the pizza worth it.

name: Michael Downey
text: Pizza's fine. Staff are generally incompetent; some more than others.

name: Lividnapkin
text: Great food.  Did a great job wit the ingredients and very fresh.

name: pat flynn
text: Good pizza, fair price for a slice and drink

name: Michael Lidell
text: Pizza Schmizza is a great place for a slice of pizza, salad, and draft beer in downtown Portland.

name: Chris Berg
text: Quality pizza, variety of beers, and a good happy hour special. However, there's an unadvertised one hour limit on WiFi access. Even if you buy a second round.

name: Randy Pablo
text: Horrible customer service. Very rude. Walked out and had a wonderful experience at Pieology just a couple blocks away.

name: Stephen Tannler
text: Friendly staff and delicious pizza. The cheese was amazing. Will have to eat in next time cause we got ours to go.

name: Jeff Crowl
text: One of the best things about moving back to Portland is getting to have Schmizza again!

name: Graham Johnson
text: Delish pizza! Great for when you're on the go. Their slices are big and filling. Interesting specialty pizzas and classics done well. Taste!

name: Conner Habib
text: Very tasty by-the-slice pizza with lots of creative options ready to eat!

name: Hugh
text: New York style Pizza by the slice. Happy hour you can get a slice of cheese/pep and a pint of Rolling Rock for $5, not bad at all.

name: Amber Cobb III
text: Nice selections of pizza slices for any pallet!

name: Javier Lopez
text: Great taste fair price.

name: Drew W
text: Despite the fact that none of my friends enjoy Pizza Schmizza that much. It is one of, if not THE favorite pizza place in Portland. Although this location is not anything special, it is the one closest to my work and I've always been pleased with the product and the service.

name: Michael Adkins
text: Decent pizza served quick at a fair price. A great place for an affordable downtown lunch. Slice and a soda for $5. I think 2-5 you can slice and a beer for a similar price.

name: Patrick Holzman
text:
Nice for slices.
Staff can be kind of spotty--I've been coming here for years and seen a pretty wide range. The pizza is consistently pleasant.

name: Aaron Kahn
text: Best I’ve had in Portland so far.

name: Shehab Abdelhamid
text: One of the best pizza places I have been too

name: FLSimageW204
text: Super helpful employees and really good pizza great combo deals

name: Fionn Anderson
text: I think they've improved lately

name: Cracker Jack
text: The black dude in the back is the best.

name: Ryan Castleberry
text: I like schmizza but this one sucks. Its always seems kind of dirty for some reason, like it's not cleaned regularly. I went there last at 8pm today and the 2 guys working there did not act like they wanted to be there. One of them even …More

name: Jos
text: Went there during the Starlight Parade and would never go back. I asked the girl at the counter if I could use two of my entertainment coupons if I did separate transactions.  She said yes. After I did my first order I pulled up my mobile …More

name: Lance Lindahl
text: Good pizza with interesting flavors as well as traditional ones.

name: Zachariah Modersbach
text: Some of the most expensive pizza I've paid for in Portland for Domino's quality taste and extremely rude service.

name: David Mayernik
text: Fast service with a $5 slice and beer happy hour. Clean and friendly with an eco-conscious feel.

name: Matthew Brownrigg
text: Some of the best pizza I've ever had

name: Pete Pedroza
text: Charming hole in the wall... A great place to grab a slice of pie when you are on the go. …More

name: Nile Haynes-Irby
text: I love pizza and its amazing how this location has pizza. I think it's sauce may be pretty tasty to all who taste it.

name: Laura Weimer
text: Tried ordering delivery but was treated like crap by two men that clearly did not want anything to do with their job. I asked them if they were messing with me due to their rude comments towards me on the phone. I had to repeat order4 …More

name: Jared Agee
text: Great food. Great staff. I could watch the soccer game while eating.

name: Derek Schuster
text: I came in an like an hour and 15 min befor closeing saying I made an order online and they said they not making pizza anymore yet it let me place the order online

name: Austin Curtis
text: Might as well go to 7-11. Terrible customer service, cold pizza and everything is out of order. Been coming to this branch for 7 years; this will be my last. Thanks for the I don't care  about Jack attitude.

name: Joshua Keihl
text: Pretty good spot for lunch near my work.  They have a good selection of slices ready to go!

name: Thomas Wysocki
text: simple pizza by the slice shop where you can choose from a variety of cool slice options such as one with spaghetti and meatballs.

name: Jessica Figurski
text: Ordering for delivery was a joke! Poor customer service and denied delivering a $72 order less than 5 mins away due to the response, "We deliver when we want to, you should pick it up ."

name: Graham Hart
text: Bomb pizza but seems a little pricey if you go past the $5 drink+slice? And no VP so not quite as good as the one near PSU! :-)

name: Austin Cram
text: Real good pizza, but a little on the pricey side. Definitely worth it though for a slice or two

name: Robert George
text: The pizza by the slice was good but needed more option

name: James E
text: Been going here for along time, fast pizza by the slice with big portions

name: Aaron Longo
text: Seemed a little dirty for a Schmizza. Pizza was greasy but good.

name: Dylan Stewart
text: Pizza is okay. Staff sucks. The location in beaverton is far better.

name: Chantel Valentin
text: The spicy Thai pizza was delicious and a great different pizza option.

name: Parker B
text: Staff was rude and unprofessional. One worker had a look of disgust on his face when we tried to order a pizza. We will not be back.

name: Margs TheMarv
text: Best pizza in Portland, hands down.

name: Justin Miller
text: Decent Pizza for your buck, if you have never had it and live under a rock.

name: Sean Goiburn
text: Same pizza used to be cheaper.. but it's the one spot in the middle of the city. Charge tourists. I'll come back infrequently.

name: Eric Rosenberg
text: Great New York style pizza with a Portland flair.

name: Cora Underhill
text: Great pricing and an awesome atmosphere
